Huffman Coding:
a = 11
  = 10
m = 1001
n = 101
, = 100
p = 001
l = 1000
c = 000

111010011110110010111000110001110110010111000011101111000100100011110111100111
The size of the coded text is 78

Classic Coding:
a = 000
  = 110
m = 011
n = 100
, = 001
p = 101
l = 111
c = 010

000110011000100001110000110101111000100001110000110010000100000111001110101000100000011000
The size of the coded text is 90
